name: Sweepy Mine
description:
Sweepy Mine was written with the following design goals:

  • Create a Mine Sweeper game that doesn't finish on a mistake
  • Introduce some dynamic physics when a mine is triggered
  • Reward the player for completing a level cleanly, and also for destroying the entire playing field
  • Create a more colouful, varied look than other Mine Sweeper puzzle games
  • Introduce some progression to the game including trophies and unlocks
